definitions: an item or amount that is or may be set off against another in the settlement of accounts.
shortDefinitions: item or amount that is or may be set off against another in settlement of accounts

definitions: a counterbalancing debt pleaded by the defendant in an action to recover money due.
shortDefinitions: counterbalancing debt pleaded by defendant in action to recover money due

definitions: a counterbalancing or compensating circumstance or condition

examples.text: as a set-off against such discussions there had come an improvement in their pecuniary position

shortDefinitions: counterbalancing or compensating circumstance or condition

definitions: a step or shoulder at which the thickness of part of a building or machine is reduced.
shortDefinitions: step or shoulder at which thickness of part of building or machine is reduced

definitions: the unwanted transference of ink from one printed sheet or page to another before it has set.
shortDefinitions: unwanted transference of ink from one printed sheet or page to another before it
